fullDescription.intro: This node utilizes the Apache Spark collaborative filtering implementation.
fullDescription.option: The number of leading singular values to keep (0 < k <= n). It might return less than k if there are numerically zero singular values or there are not enough Ritz values converged before the maximum number of Arnoldi update iterations is reached (in case that matrix A is ill-conditioned).
The reciprocal condition number (rCond). All singular values smaller than rCond * sigma(0) are treated as zero, where sigma(0) is the largest singular value.
Select this option to compute the U matrix (left singular vectors).

ports.inPort: Spark RDD with user ratings of products
ports.outPort: The input data labeled with the prediction.
